sentence: Afghanistan - Adjusted net intake rate for primary education
Afghanistan adjusted net intake rate for primary education was 19.9 % in 1993 , down by 0.00 % from 1974 .
In 2018 , adult illiteracy for Afghanistan was 12.1 million .
Adult illiteracy of Afghanistan increased from 5.93 million in 1979 to 12.1 million in 2018 growing at an average annual rate of 31.07 % .
In 2018 , assault rate for Georgia was 4.6 cases per 100,000 population .
Though Georgia assault rate fluctuated substantially in recent years , it tended to decrease through 2006 - 2018 period ending at 4.6 cases per 100,000 population in 2018 .
